title: Cuphead Deluxe Edition Art Book Is Over 60% Off At Amazon

description: A stellar combat system and multitude of strategic wrinkles are the glue that holds this well-told, if disjointed, episodic story together.
title: Octopath Traveler 0 Review

description:
Slay the Spire redefined the roguelike‑deckbuilder genre by combining persistent runs, branching paths, and card‑based combat into a compact package with high replay value. Its appeal lies in the loop of building a deck, upgrading it while ascending the spire, reacting to relics and events, and seeing how far you can climb. Slay the Spire wasn't the first game of its kind, but it is the one that set the genre on fire, inspiring dozens of other games to replicate its mechanics and structure in their own unique ways.

If you’re looking for more games like Slay the Spire that replicate that feel--drawing cards, constructing synergies, riding the tension of a run--this list will get you started. Below are 15 excellent games that channel that deckbuilding and roguelike spirit, each with its own twist or flavor on the formula.


Balatro<
title: Best Games Like Slay The Spire

description: The dream of Skyblivion goes back over a decade as a team of fans came together to use The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim's engine to fully recreate and re-imagine Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion as a modern RPG. At the beginning of 2023, the team set a 2025 premiere for Skyblivion. However, that's no longer the plan and Skyblivion has been pushed to next year. The good news is that the latest dev video shows off how much has been finished and what remains to be done.
title: Skyblivion Is Delayed To 2026, But It Already Looks Very Good
Silicon Power 1TB MicroSD Express For Switch 2 Drops To $154 At Amazon

description:
One of the new maps coming to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 in Season 1 includes Splitgate-like portals that allow players to instantly transport themselves from one area of the arena to another.

The map, Fate, is set inside David Mason's mind, taking players "into the nightmare he's tried to forget."

"Step into a warped vision of Menendez's Nicaraguan compound, now twisted beyond recognition: colossal machetes carve through the sky, and shattered pieces of reality hang suspended as if time itself has splintered," reads a line from the description.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Is Adding A Map With Portals

description:
Call of Duty Mobile is celebrating the game's sixth anniversary with plenty of new content. While Black Ops 7 is sticking to thematically appropriate operator skins, Season 11 of Call of Duty Mobile includes a major crossover with Street Fighter, which allows players to transform into the popular fighting characters and use their iconic fighting moves. This new season also adds a DMZ extraction mode, new loadout items to unlock, and special events.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Season 11 start date details
  • Battle pass details

Season 11 start date details

Season 11 starts on December 11 at 12 PM PT / 3 PM ET. T
title: Call Of Duty Mobile Season 11 Adds A Cool Crossover You Won't Find In Black Ops 7

description:
Legendary game designer and programmer Ron Gilbert (Monkey Island) has revealed that one of his exciting-sounding upcoming projects has been canceled due in part to investors not coming to the table to fund the project.

Speaking to Ars Technica, Gilbert said this game had a vision of being a "large, open-world-type RPG" in the vein of The Legend of Zelda. Gilbert worked alongside two other people--an artist and a designer--for about a year on the project before Gilbert realized it was not going to happen.

"I just [didn't] have the money or the time to build a big open-world game like that," he said. "You know, it's either a passion project you spent 10 years on, or you just need a bunch of money to be able to hire people and resources."
title: Game With Amazing Premise Has Been Canceled
Evercade Street Fighter & Mega Man Cartridge-Based Arcades Finally Back In Stock At Amazon

description:
Getting 100% completion in a Metroid game--and metroidvania titles in general--is a satisfying achievement that's part of the genre's appeal. However, in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, there is unfortunately a way to pigeonhole yourself where collecting everything needed isn't possible. Now, the game will warn you about a point of no return, but it's still easy to make a regrettable decision. That's why GameSpot's reviewer for the first-person adventure, Steve Watts, advises players to make a copy of their main save in another save slot before entering the endgame.

Watts detailed the "confusing choice" that Nintendo and developer Retro Studios made in his Metroid Prime 4 review. "When I was ready to proceed to the endgame, I got the usual warnings about a point of no return, but I had figured I could always load an older save to go b
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Players, Be Sure To Do This Before Entering Endgame

title: Fallout Season 1 Limited Edition Steelbook Restocked At Amazon

description:
Fallout Season 2 premieres on December 17, and in a big change from Season 1, episodes will be released weekly instead of all at once. Prime Video has now published the full release schedule for Fallout Season 2, so you can plan and prepare for all eight episodes.

Episodes will be released weekly on Wednesdays at midnight PT, and the sophomore season will run through February 4, 2026. Fallout Season 1 also had eight episodes.

Fallout Season 2 schedule

  • Episode 1 - December 17 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 2- December 24 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 3 - December 31 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 4 - January 7 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 5 - January 14 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 6 - January 21 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
  • Episode 7 - January 28 at 12 AM PT / 3 AM ET
title: Fallout Season 2 Episode Release Date Schedule

description:
Prediction markets have been popular for years, and now Roblox's top boss has said he wants to see them integrated into the hugely popular game someday.

CEO Dave Baszucki told The New York Times, "We would. I think we would have to do that."

It's not so easy, though, as Baszucki said every country has different legislation surrounding "loot boxes and kid gambling," so there are regulatory hurdles that would need be sorted out.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Roblox CEO Wants Prediction Markets In The Game Someday

description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has enjoyed an exceptional year, becoming the most-nominated game in the history of The Game Awards. Its cast--Ben Starr, Charlie Cox, and Jennifer English among them--earned major recognition in the show's performance categories, helping cement the game as one of the year's standout achievements. But even while celebrating this success, the cast has been discussing ways the awards could grow, especially when it comes to recognizing the full range of performance work that brings modern games to life.

In an interview with Video Games Chronicle, cast members English, Shayla Nyx, Devora Wilde, and Aliona Baranova shared their hope that The Game Awards will eventually expand its performance categories. They ex
title: Clair Obscur Cast Wants TGA To Have More Awards For Actors

description:
Sony's popular and longrunning professional baseball series, MLB The Show, is expanding to a new place: mobile. A new version of the game "built from the ground up" for mobile is headed to iOS and Android, with a test coming up soon in the Philippines before a global rollout later.

The regional test for the Philippines begins today, December 3, but there is no word yet on when the game will be available in more places. This kind of limited, regional rollout is common for mobile games.

A FAQ for The Show's mobile version confirms it is a standalone game that will not support cross-play with the console editions. The game is optimized for iPhone 16 or "comparable devices" in the Apple family, along with Samsung Galaxy S25, Sony Xperia V, or "comparable" phones.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: MLB The Show Announced For Mobile, See The First Trailer

description:
Fallout Season 1 is now free to stream ahead of the Season 2 premiere on December 17, but only in one place. The first season is now available to stream for free on Samsung TV Plus.

The catch is that you have to watch ads, but you don't have to subscribe to anything. Season 1 is free on Samsung TV Plus now through December 25. Samsung TV Plus is available on Samsung TV, Galaxy, Smart monitor, and Family Hub devices.

For more, check out GameSpot's Fallout TV show review for Season 1. We also have an explainer for the ending of Season 1.

Continue Reading
title: Fallout Season 1 Now Free To Stream Ahead Of S2 Premiere, But There Is A Catch

description:
Fortnite began its life as an unremarkable co-op survival game, and then became the hottest battle royale game in the world--and these days, Fortnite is a lot of other things, too. Since the end of 2023, Epic has launched a pile of varied new modes--Blitz Royale, Reload, Lego Fortnite, Fortnite Festival, Ballistic, and Rocket Racing--while Fortnite's ecosystem of user-created experiences in Creative continues to grow at a breakneck pace as that ecosystem found its first blockbuster this year with the Roblox clone Steal the Brainrot. So the concept of "games like Fortnite" includes a lot of different things at this point.

Fortnite is still primarily known as a battle royale, judging by the player-counts--but the rest of Fortnite continues to grow. Some folks, like me, like to sample everything, and some tend to stay in the modes and games they already
title: 21 Games Like Fortnite You Can Try Out In 2026

description:
Samus Aran might not be known as a chatty character, but a voice actor helps flesh out the heroine with grunts and mumbles. Jennifer Hale, probably best known as Commander Shepard in the Mass Effect trilogy, previously provided the voice for Samus in the first three Metroid Prime games. But for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, Erin Yvette voices the protagonist and Krystle Martin provides the motion capture, per Nintendo Life.

This isn't the first time Yvette has worked with Nintendo. Her previous experience with the company includes voicing Neilnail in Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition and Great Fairy Cotera in Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity. Meanwhile,
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Features A New Samus Aran Voice Actor

description:
Recently, CD Projekt published a social media post about Cyberpunk 2077 that some took to be a teaser for some kind of announcement on December 10, the game's fifth anniversary.

This was not a teaser for anything, CD Projekt's Marcin Momot has now clarified. The developer publishes these kinds of posts every 30 days to celebrate birthdays for Cyberpunk characters, and for December, the 10th was mentioned as well to celebrate the game's fifth anniversary.

"It's not a teaser. Hope this clears things up!" he wrote.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: That Wasn't A Cyberpunk 2077 Teaser After All

description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been one of 2025's standout hits, and now it's been confirmed that the game broke records for Xbox Game Pass.

Microsoft announced that Expedition 33 has become the "biggest new third-party game launch on Xbox Game Pass of 2025" based on number of unique users in the first 30 days. It's not clear what title Expedition 33 took down to become No. 1 for third-party games on Game Pass.

Expedition 33 was developed by Sandfall Interactive, and it was the team's first game. Creative director Guilllaume Broche said, "This year has been so far beyond what any of us could have imagined, and it's down to how passionate and supportive our fans have been to make that a reality."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Breaks Game Pass Records

description:
A new PlayStation 5 system software update is out now, but don't expect a whole lot in terms of new features. This update, like many before it, is focused on system stability.

The new update, which brings the PS5 up to version 25.08-12.40.00, makes improvements to messages and usability on some screens, and also improves performance and stability generally.

Companies like Sony historically don't like to change things up too drastically with system updates around the holidays, and this new update is in keeping with that tradition.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: New PS5 Update Out Now, Doesn't Do Much

description:
According to one analyst, Call of Duty as a franchise is "underperforming" in 2025 due to a variety of factors. Rhys Elliott of Alinea Analytics said in an interview that some of the factors that he believes are contributing to Call of Duty's decline include "community burnout, questionable creative and business decisions by Activision/Microsoft, and strong competition."

In terms of the competition, Elliott called out Battlefield 6 and Arc Raiders, along with Fortnite, which recently had a popular Simpsons season and launched its positively received Chapter 7.

"Xbox dropped the ball on the wrong year, as this year saw some of the most exciting shooter releases in years," Elliott told Eurogamer. "Attention is scarce."
title: Call Of Duty Is Underperforming In 2025, Analyst Says, Citing Burnout, Creative Decisions, And AI Slop

description:
Whether you're looking for a game like Destiny because you want to broaden your horizons, or because you're one of the disappointed thousands migrating from the series this year, we've compiled a list of games that'll scratch that same itch. Destiny 2 wasn't as successful as Sony had hoped following the acquisition, contributing to a $204 million shortfall in 2025, a continually dwindling player count across both games, as well as significant complaints from fans about the apparent decline in the game's quality. As such, you might be looking to get your kicks elsewhere.

We've not quite abandoned ship just yet, especially after our 9/10
title: The Best Games like Destiny

description:
Octopath Traveler 0 is now the third main game in the series that began Square Enix's "HD-2D" renaissance, taking both cult-classic and classically styled RPGs and imbuing them with a particular visual look and feel that pays homage to the heyday of 16-bit RPG excellence. Octopath itself has been iterated on enough that it's forged its own identity within that framework, giving Octopath Traveler 0 the freedom to break some of its own conventions and iterate on others. It's a reimagining of what an Octopath game means, and more than that, an excellent game in its own right.

Octopath Traveler 0 begins with character creation, which itself is a big departure from the Octopath norm. The games have previously told eight interconnected stories, each focused on named, individual characters. This new approach has you create your own protagonist, and they remain locked in your party throughout the entire game as the rest of it is filled in by various companion char
title: Octopath Traveler 0 Review - From Zero To Heroes

description:
It may come as no surprise that Valve has invested in emulation tech for Arm-based hardware, having just announced its first device running an Arm chip. But beyond its own hardware, Valve's support of open-source emulation projects may have laid the groundwork for playing your favorite PC games on Arm devices like mobiles and tablets--no ports necessary.

Valve's upcoming Steam Frame headset is the company's first Arm-based device, making use of the open-source FEX emulator to run Windows-native games. As it turns out, Valve has had more of a hand in FEX's development than it initially appeared. In an interview with
title: Valve Has Quietly Funded Multiple Open Source Programs Needed To Run Windows Games On Phones
